Articles.Content: I booted up ksp today for the first time in ages and I noticed the distinct lack of a collider display mod. I only knew the name of one, collide-o-scope, and the Github page had it updated for 1.5; I assumed it would sort of work. There appears to be a new two folders in the local files (plugins, plugin data) and i tried sticking the mod in them. It didn't work so I tried the old method with the Gamedata folder. That didn't work either; I'm not sure which dodgy part is the problem and also not sure how to install mods now at all. Any help would be appreciated.

All I can tell you is, if the mod worked in 1.5 I'd be pretty hopeful it'd work in 1.6.

And gamedata is correct... It should be a single folder off of gamedata, usually named after the mod's name.

Edited January 30, 2019 by 5thHorseman
